"Oh, perfect timing! Good afternoon, I'm: "...A proper greeting? When did you learn manners!?"
"While Tea recovers from the shock, I have a question!!"
"To be blunt, have you gotten into trouble? Done something that could endanger ARKS?"
"I don't have any details, but I heard a rumor along those lines."
"We think the source...is a member of VOID."
"So we thought if we asked you, we might get the scoop! Any ideas?"
"...um, don't worry. We have not spoken to anyone else about this."
"That's right! You have an exclusive contract with our dynamic duo after all!"
"We may chat with you but we don't blab about it to others. It's our policy."
"We've been investigating the best we can, but it seems we're always two steps behind..."
"Besides, we got that other big job to worry about. Can you blame us?"
"The best we can do is give you a heads-up."
"It's so frustrating not to know what 'something' is, but like, what can you do?"
"Anywho, time to roll up our sleeves and scour the galaxy for answers like we do best!"
